title: 15 Minute Guided Meditation | Strength & Grounding In Stressful Times
description:
This short guided 15 minute meditation for strength and grounding will help relieve anxiety and stress  during stressful and uncertain times in your life. Through the simple act of reconnecting with your inner self, this easy guided meditation is perfect for anyone that is needing some positivity and peace in their life. 

 It is time to let go of the negativity, stress, anxiety....whatever is holding you back in your life. Let this class take you on a meditative journey to cleanse and heal yourself from the inside out. 

So find a quiet space, put some headphones on, close your eyes, and enjoy. 

🚨 Check out our NEW youtube channel dedicated EXCLUSIVELY to Meditations 🚨 
https://flow.bohobeautiful.life/BohoBeautifulMind-

Free yoga videos for the digital yogi. 
Specializing in content highlighting fitness, pilates, vegan food, guided meditations and thoughtful blogs for conscious and mindful living. Boho Beautiful is the creation and beating heart of both Juliana and Mark Spicoluk.

If you are new to the Boho Beautiful family, be ready to experience everything from beginner and intermediate to yin, hatha, ashtanga and so much more.

comments:
We are thrilled to let u beautiful people know we now have 3 options for taking your mediation practice deeper with us… ✨

Namaste...
Juliana & Mark ☮

To anybody reading this, I pray that whatever is hurting you or whatever you are constantly stressing about gets better. May the dark thoughts, the overthinking, and the doubt exit your mind may clarity replace confusion. may peace and calmness fill your life 💕💗💓

If you are reading comments to decide if you should do this meditation, just hit play. I have listened to thousands... This is by far my favorite ❤️! She is in another realm of consciousness with this one. Your are safe... you are sacred... don't be afraid...

I’m not sure why, but good meditations make you cry. They release emotions you had stored away out of fear, or feeling like you needed to protect yourself. But you are safe, it is true. And you are loved. Sitting and remembering that you are your own sacred being, capable of producing beauty and wonder and kindness is such a healing thing.

I needed this, I’m feeling lost right now, and I know the only person who can truly help me is myself. I may be scared, but i won’t let it guide me. This meditation helped me to let my inner fire burn brighter, and envision myself a warrior. Thank you.
"everything I need is within me" thank you ever so much! 🙏
